TopicTitle: (0.23) Wayland Corp. Development and released download Thread (new parts)

Articles.Content: is your command module upside down? blue windows up

Hey, Does anyone know why mechjeb HATES the space eagle? I am playing 19.0.0 (or whatever it was) and it tries to land upside down, Does anyone know why?

Have you added a small docking port along the top spine and told it to control from here?

I posted on spaceport, but i figured you might read this thread a a little more often.

copy/pasted:

love the parts! itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one feature away from being perfect- any chance you can make these parts able to dock with the stock docking ports for resource transfer? I currently have a spherical spaceplane that uses your hatch perfectly but has no room for the clamp o trons. also, I edited the part.cfg to include the docking port size1 module. the proper context menus show up in flight (I have the docking camera mod installed as well- it shows activate docking camera) so I know I edited the part correctly. However, docking with my space station doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t work. there must be a way to edit the attachment rules to properly allow dockingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

when I try to dock, it seems the magnetism attempts to grab the outer ring of the hatch instead of the flat front surface.

I posted on spaceport, but i figured you might read this thread a a little more often.

copy/pasted:

love the parts! itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one feature away from being perfect- any chance you can make these parts able to dock with the stock docking ports for resource transfer? I currently have a spherical spaceplane that uses your hatch perfectly but has no room for the clamp o trons. also, I edited the part.cfg to include the docking port size1 module. the proper context menus show up in flight (I have the docking camera mod installed as well- it shows activate docking camera) so I know I edited the part correctly. However, docking with my space station doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t work. there must be a way to edit the attachment rules to properly allow dockingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

when I try to dock, it seems the magnetism attempts to grab the outer ring of the hatch instead of the flat front surface.

Unfortunately docking ports also require an object in unity to be in the model, as well as the config edit so it would not be a 5 second job.. ill try and get back to the eagle on the weekend if I have some time.

Ok, so I installed the Pegasus X-2, and the latest version of MechJeb (v2.0.8). For some reason, the engines STILL won't show up. Does it require MechJeb 1.9.x? If so, I suggest updating it to use MechJeb v2.0.8, as I'm quite sure that's the version that most people use.

EDIT: Ok, I think the reason that the engines won't load, is that they are loaded before MechJeb. As the Pegasus has to be installed in the parts folder (the old system), they load before MechJeb, which goes in GameData. I think I'll just add PART {} brackets to the engine .cfg's and move them to the /GameData/WaylandCorp folder.

EDIT2: Nope, didn't work, sadly. Guess it only works with MechJeb 1.

Edited June 21, 2013 by wasmic

Hi, really keen to try the new version of the Pegasus. I notice that the kerbalspaceport version is still v2.1

Is there anywhere else I am able to download v2.2?

Thanks in advance!
Btw, can anyone tell me if it's Part {} or PART {} ?

Btw, can anyone tell me if it's Part {} or PART {} ?

PART {} as far as a I know, see the Bobcat posts about the DEMVs to check me on that.
Ok.Then I guess there's no way to make the Pegasus X-2 work until Devo updates it.

Ok.Then I guess there's no way to make the Pegasus X-2 work until Devo updates it.

Every single one of my mods can be fixed for 0.20 if you spend 5 minutes making some config edits. Even the ones that require damned robotics work now if you spend just a little bit of time.

It's PART {

at the start of the config

and

}

at the end. of it.

If a node is not matching the ship and parts don't align, it most likely the part was rescaled, so it needs the line Scale = 1 in the config before the rescaleFactor = .

I will eventually get around to fixing up all my old mods, there is so many updates to KSP they make to the base structure its like starting all over again sometimes.

I am in the middle of trying to print out some of my mods and kerbals on my printer, so im just taking a bit of a break. the ISS thing sorta bummed me out so I couldn't really be bothered with it at the moment and Fustek looks like his pack will actually look better than the ISS one, so meh.. i'll go off and play for a bit.
Make sure ya post pics if you get good prints bud!
Make sure ya post pics if you get good prints bud!

I have added PART {} wrappers around the engine .cfg's. That was why I asked. Only the engines are missing - all the other parts work fine. I suspect that your engines need mechjeb 1 instead of mechjeb 2, which I am using. This would result in the engines not being loaded. I have already written much more on this problem on the previous page.

I have added PART {} wrappers around the engine .cfg's. That was why I asked. Only the engines are missing - all the other parts work fine. I suspect that your engines need mechjeb 1 instead of mechjeb 2, which I am using. This would result in the engines not being loaded. I have already written much more on this problem on the previous page.

If the engines are not showing, install the other mechjeb version also. You can run mechjeb2 and the previous one together OK.
Devo, those prints are cool!
